sentences.english: Of these four things , the first is your legal due.

sentences.english: At the cost balance point on the institutional margin, the allocation of power achieves Pareto Optimality.
sentences.chinese: 在制度边际成本持平处权力的配置达到帕累托最优。

sentences.english: In an information-based world, power diffusion may pose a bigger danger than power transition.

sentences.english: It would be a complete mistake to decry love of power altogether as a motive.

sentences.english: Mr Dobson also has an unmatched power-base.

sentences.english: The new laws empower the police to stop anybody in the street.

sentences.english: Gorged with power, I grew blind to Pokemon being alive.

sentences.english: Mediation priority, early prevention, public power dominant the social security are essential Countermeasure.
